Posts.Content: Joanne - i had PICC line in when I got my first lot of 15 cycles of chemo and had no problems I had it removed no problem there either they pull it out and you dont feel a thing. I am now on another lot of chemo and have another line in you get used to it very quickly and it does make things a lot easier. Hope this helps take care xx
Posts.Title: Picc line/bad veins
